Use a ladder or a zip line to climb up to the top floor.
Build a makeshift rope bridge across the gap between buildings to reach the desired floor.
Create a homemade helicopter using materials such as cardboard boxes, balloons, and string.
Ask a friend who lives in the building to let you use their apartment for a few hours so you can climb to the top floor.

If there are no other options available, consider taking a risk by attempting to rappel down the side of the building. However, this should only be attempted by experienced climbers and with proper safety equipment.
